author: Staff Reporter
text:
Residents staged a road roko in Vettavalam Road here.

They condemned the municipality for its failure to repair a leaking Under Ground Sewage Scheme (UGSS) line in the area.

Sewage that leaked from the UGSS line in Keel Nathur area was freely flowing in the streets.

This made life difficult for the residents.

No step taken so far

The sewage flow has turned our neighbourhood unhygienic, they charged. Though the problem persists for several days municipality has taken no step to repair the line they charged.

Police pacified the residents and made them to give up protest.
title: Residents demand to repair leaking drainage line
